aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: International Federation of Businessmen and Businesswomen
aboutUs.description:
The International Federation of Businessmen and Businesswomen is a non-profit economic organization established in the United States of America. The federation aims to provide a wide range of economic, administrative, and legal services to its members, facilitating their work and securing their requirements.

We serve our members through a highly experienced team in the business field, along with carefully selected global partners and suppliers according to the highest standards. Joining the federation allows you to enhance your network and connect with a large elite of businessmen and businesswomen from around the world, working together under the slogan: Together, we build a new world.

connectUs.title: Start Your Project Now with Our Experts!
connectUs.description: Contact us now and get all the necessary consultations for your business!

footer.description: We are the Iraqi Businessmen's Union, committed to supporting and empowering business leaders.

achievements.title: Achievements of the Federation
achievements.description: Supporting and empowering business leaders worldwide by enhancing trade exchange and improving economic systems.

message.title: Our Message
message.content: Supporting and empowering business leaders worldwide by enhancing trade exchange, improving economic systems, and collaborating with governments to create sustainable global investment opportunities.
